votings.borda-nauru: Nauru's Borda Count or Borda Dowdall (1/n)

confirmAuditBallot.header: Do you want to Audit the ballot?
confirmAuditBallot.body:
Auditing the ballot will spoil it and you will need to start the process of voting again if you want to cast your vote. The ballot audit process allows you to verify it's correctly encoded. Doing this process requires you to have important technical knowledge, so we do not recommend it if you do not know what you are doing.

If you just want to cast your ballot, click Cancel to go back to the review ballot screen.
confirmAuditBallot.confirm: Yes, I want to DISCARD my ballot to audit it

warnBallotParity.body: No puede continuarse porque la papeleta no es paritaria y en cremallera. Por favor, comprueba que tu selección esté compuesta de forma que detrás de una mujer luego va un hombre y así sucesivamente.

avBooth.thisisATest: Warning! This is a TEST election
avBooth.stepsToVote: You need to follow these steps to cast your ballot:
avBooth.selectOptionsText: Answer to the election questions one by one as they are shown. This way you will configure your preferences in your ballot.
avBooth.reviewOptionsText: Once you have chosen your preferences, we will proceed to encrypt them and you'll be shown the ballot's tracker id. You'll also be shown a summary with the content of your ballot for review.
avBooth.emitBallotText: You can cast it so that it's properly registered. Alternatively, you can audit that your ballot was correctly encrypted.
avBooth.emitBallotTextNoAudit: You can cast it so that it's properly registered.
avBooth.errorHtml:
The following problem arised (identifier __errorId__):

__error__

If you think that you need to contact us, you can do so sending an email to __email__.
avBooth.errorLoadingImages: Error on voting booth. Images not loaded.
avBooth.errorLoadingElection: Error loading the election. This could be happenning for multiple reasons: the link might be invalid, you might have typed it incorrectly or the link might have been incorrectly crafted. Please, try to produce the link again. Finally, the server might be temporarily unavailable. If that's the case, try again later and if the issue persists please contact us.
avBooth.errorLoadingElectionPubKeys: Error loading the election public keys. This could be happenning for multiple reasons: the link might be invalid, you might have typed it incorrectly or the link might have been incorrectly crafted. Please, try to produce the link again. Finally, the server might be temporarily unavailable. If that's the case, try again later and if the issue persists please contact us.
avBooth.errorSendingBallot: Error sending the ballot. It was not correctly cast. Please, try again in another and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists try to contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.errorCastingBallotUnknown: Uncatalogued error during ballot casting. Please, try again in another and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists try to contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.errorEncryptingBallotUnknown: Uncatalogued error during ballot encryption. Please, try again in another and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists try to contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.errorElectionIsNotOpen: The election is not open, so you cannot vote. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.errorSendingBallotElectionNotOpen: The ballot could not be cast because the election is not open. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.couldntSendBallotUnauthorized: The ballot couldn't be cast because the authentication token associated to this link is invalid. Sorry for the inconvenience. If the problem persists, please try to contact us.
avBooth.errorEncrypting: There was a problem while ballot encryption and it couldn't be cast. This is probably due to you being using an outdated web browser unsupported by our software. Please, try again in a different and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists please contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.errorEncoding:
__msg__

There was a problem during ballot encoding and as a result your ballot was not cast. This is probably due to you being using an outdated web browser unsupported by our software. Please, try again in a different and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists please contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.sanityChecksFailed: There was a problem during the automatic encoding verifications done before ballot casting, and as a result your ballot was not cast. This is probably due to you being using an outdated web browser unsupported by our software. Please, try again in a different and more updated web browser, and if the problem persists please contact us. Sorry for the inconvenience.
avBooth.couldntSendBallotNotFound: The ballot could not be sent. There might be an issue with the connection,  or the server might be temporarily unavailable. If that's the case, please try again later and if the issue persists please contact us.
avBooth.questionSelectedOptionsTitleOrdered: selected options (__count__) in order, drag and drop to reorder it
avBooth.questionSelectedOptionsTitleOrdered_plur: selected options (__count__) in order, drag and drop to reorder it
avBooth.maxSelectedLimitReached_singular: Remember that you can only choose one option
avBooth.maxSelectedLimitReached: Maximum number of selected options reached (__max__). To select an option, deselect another first.
avBooth.maxSelectedLimitTagReached: You cannot select more options of type __tagName__ (máximo __max__). To select one, please deselect another first.
avBooth.maxSelectedLimitNoTagReached: You cannot select more options not of type __tagName__ (máximo __max__). To select one, please deselect another first.
avBooth.alreadySelectedDocumentType: You can't select two documents of the same type - deselect it first.
avBooth.alreadySelectedPack: You selected an option linked to some other documents. It's not possible to select them in isolation.
avBooth.cantSelectPack: You tried to select option linked that cannot be selected in isolation, and you have already another option selected.
avBooth.tooManyUserUpdates: Your ballot could not be cast because you have changed too many times in this election. As a result, your last correctly cast ballot it is the one that will count.
avBooth.errorElectionUrl: The introduced address has an erroneous format
avBooth.reviewYourBallotTitle: Ballot not sent yet: review it first
avBooth.reviewYourBallotText: Before casting your vote, please review the content of your ballot
avBooth.statusExecutingSanityChecks: Verifying that the web browser is able to encode the ballot, please wait (__percentage__% completed)
avBooth.statusEncryptingQuestion: Encrypting answers to question __questionNum__, please wait (__percentage__% completed)
avBooth.statusVerifyingQuestion: Verifying the encrypted answers to question __questionNum__, please wait (__percentage__% completed)
avBooth.sendingBallot: Sending the ballot to the server, please wait (__percentage__% completed)
avBooth.successSubheader: You have correctly cast your ballot and it's now being kept in our electronic ballot box.
avBooth.alreadySelectedAPack: You already selected a pack. Remove your selection to be able to select another
avBooth.optionInCategoryAlreadySelected: To be able to select a pack, please deselect any other item
avBooth.cantSelectNormalOptionPackAlreadySelecte: To be able to select an option, please deselect the pack you chose
avBooth.cantSelectPackNormalOptionAlreadySelecte: To be able to select a pack, pelase deselect the options you chose
avBooth.helpTextViewSingleCandidates: Click in View to select single candidates
avBooth.helpTextViewCell: Click in a cell to select it all
avBooth.cannotSelectAll: To select all those options you have to desect some first
avBooth.auditBallotText:
The ballot tracker id is: __ballotHash__

The audit of the ballot requires some technical knowledge. If you don't have it, you can simply start again the voting process clicking in the button below.

To verify your ballot you need to:

  1. Copy and save to a file your ballot (click to select):
    __auditableBallot__
  2. Follow the steps in this tutorial to verify that the ballot was correctly encrypted.

For security reasons, if you audit the ballot, it needs to be spoiled. To continue the voting process, you need to start from the begining.
avBooth.thisisADemoNotification: Warning! Demo voting booth, votes issued from this booth will not count.
avBooth.successBallotHash:
You have cast your ballot with __name__. The ballot tracker of your ballot is:

__ballotHash__

You can use your ballot tracker to verify that your ballot has been correctly cast using this address.
avBooth.successBallotQrCode: You can verify your ballot has been correctly cast using the following QR Code:
avBooth.successNoBallotHash: Congratulations! You have cast your ballot with __name__.

ballotTicket.h4: Your vote has been cast correctly. This document justifies its issuance.
ballotTicket.title: Election title:
ballotTicket.qrCode: You can use the following QR Code to access the ballot tracker link:
ballotTicket.isDemo: This vote receipt was generated in a demo voting booth. The ballot was NOT cast.

avBooth.relatedLinksText: For more information about this election:
avBooth.openOptionLink: Open link in a new tab

pairwiseBeta.warning: Click to choose. __count__ of __max__ comparison done.
pairwiseBeta.warning_plural: Click to choose. __count__ of __max__ comparisons done.

confirmNullVote.body: You have not selected any option in some question, which is equivalent to vote in blank.
confirmNullVote.confirm: Yes, I want to vote in blank when not selecting any option

busy.title: Your ballot will be...
busy.encryptedDescription: so that nobody can know what options you chose
busy.castDescription: using a secure channel and verifying your identity
busy.anonymizedDescription: so that the tally does not reveal which way you voted

tooFewAnswers.body: In the following questions you have not selected as many options as the minimum number needed to continue:
tooFewAnswers.question: Question '__title__': you chose __selected__ options, but you need to choose at least __min__ options

selectAllCategory.body: Hey! It looks like you want to select all the options of __category__
